name: Bugged Out (itch)
description:
Bugged Out - Ludum Dare 31.

Game by Sebastian Lague (Code), Daniel Snd (Art) and Thiago Adamo PxlDJ (Audio).

Play some old games on your computer and try not to get bugged out!

  • If you need to change quality settings use F1 to F5 (F1 lowest quality).
  • W & S to move your pong racket.
  • ASDW to move around. Left and Right Mouse clicks for attacks.
